00068 inline void CArrowShape::EnsurePointsAreValid() const
00069 {
00070        if (!m_arePointsValid){
00071               const i2d::CLine2d* linePtr = dynamic_cast<const i2d::CLine2d*>(GetModelPtr());
00072               if (linePtr != NULL){
00073                      const i2d::ICalibration2d* calibrationPtr = linePtr->GetCalibration();
00074 
00075                      CalcPoints(*linePtr, calibrationPtr);
00076               }
00077               else{
00078                      ResetPoints();
00079               }
00080               m_arePointsValid = true;
00081        }
00082 }
